name: CraftsMan
description:
Craftsman is a game about a cubic world in which you can build anything you want. Explore the location, get resources and indulge in creativity! In this game there is no pre-written plot, you have to create your own story. No one will tell you where to go and what to do, but you will surely understand everything yourself, because this fascinating cubic world is familiar to us all. Feel like a real craftsman!

Main Features


  • Open world for exploration
  • Resource management
  • A construction system limited only by your imagination
  • Pleasant visual and sound design
